histogram.name: DevTools.ActionTaken
histogram.summary: Specified DevTools action has been taken.

histogram.name: DevTools.BackgroundService.ClearEvents
histogram.summary: The result of clearing all stored events for a Background Service feature. This is called if a developer clicks on a delete button in a Background Service DevTools panel.

histogram.name: DevTools.BackgroundService.GetEvents
histogram.summary: The result of loading all stored events for a Background Service feature. This is called when the a Bakground Service DevTools panel is opened.

histogram.name: DevTools.BackgroundService.LogEvent
histogram.summary: The result of logging a Background Service event. An event is logged if `Recording` mode is on and a relevant Background Service event is taking place.

histogram.name: DevTools.BackgroundService.StartRecording
histogram.summary: Records the Background Service for which `Recording` mode was enabled. This is called if the developer toggles the record button in the relevant Bakground Service DevTools panel.

histogram.name: DevTools.CDPCommandFrom{ClientType}
histogram.summary: Records CDP command usage originating from {ClientType}. This is recorded whenever a CDP session receives and handles a command from a CDP client.

histogram.name: DevTools.ConsoleShowsCorsErrors
histogram.summary: Records if showing CORS erros in DevTools Console is enabled.

histogram.name: DevTools.CSSHintShown
histogram.summary: Records how many times different CSS hint types were shown in the Styles panel in DevTools. It's recorded when a hint icon is shown in the Styles panel.

histogram.name: DevTools.DeveloperResourceLoaded
histogram.summary:
Records for each developer resource load that the DevTools front-end issues (e.g. to load a source map) several enum values encoding which load method was used, whether a fallback was used (and why), and whether the method succeeded or not.
Some explanations to make sense of the enum values:
LoadsThroughPage = LoadThroughPageViaTarget + LoadThroughPageViaFrame
SuccessfulLoadsThroughPage = LoadsThroughPage - LoadThroughPageFailure
LoadThroughPageFallback is the number of loads that can in principle be loaded through the page, but had to use the fallback because either loading through the page failed (LoadThroughPageFailure), or there was insufficient information to dispatch the load through the page; the number of such loads can be computed as LoadThroughPageFallback - LoadThroughPageFailure.
The number of loads not eligible for loading through the page can be computed as FallbackPerOverride + FallbackPerProtocol, where FallbackPerOverride indicates loads where the DevTools user disabled loading through the page via an override, and FallbackPerProtocol indicates loads where DevTools could not load the resource via the page due to the resource's protocol scheme.
The total number of loads that used the fallback can be computed as LoadThroughPageFallback + FallbackPerOverride + FallbackPerProtocol. Adding SuccessfulLoadsThroughPage to that number gives the total number of loads.

histogram.name: DevTools.DeveloperResourceScheme
histogram.summary:
Records for each developer resource load that the DevTools front-end issues (e.g. to load a source map) one enum value that records the scheme of the resource's URL. For HTTP and HTTPS schemes, there are two enums each: One that signifies that the host was localhost, and one that signifies that it wasn't, i.e. to get the total number of resource loads using a HTTP scheme one must add the numbers of SchemeHttp and SchemeHttpLocalhost.
The value SchemeUnknown signifies that parsing the scheme from the URL failed (note that at the point the enum is recorded, only absolute URLs arrive).

histogram.name: DevTools.ExperimentDisabled
histogram.summary: Fired when a devtools experiment is disabled from the experiments tab.

histogram.name: DevTools.ExperimentEnabled
histogram.summary: Fired when a devtools experiment is enabled from the experiments tab.

histogram.name: DevTools.ExperimentEnabledAtLaunch
histogram.summary: Fires for each experiment that is enabled at the time of Devtools Launch.

histogram.name: DevTools.InspectElement
histogram.summary: Time to load Developer Tools when user clicks Inspect Element in the context menu.

histogram.name: DevTools.IssueCreated
histogram.summary: Records the issue type when an issue is created for the Issues Panel.

histogram.name: DevTools.IssuesPanelIssueExpanded
histogram.summary: Records which type of issue is expanded in the issues panel.

histogram.name: DevTools.IssuesPanelOpenedFrom
histogram.summary: Records which UI element is being used to open the Issues Panel.

histogram.name: DevTools.IssuesPanelResourceOpened
histogram.summary: Records which resource from what issue category is opened in the issue panel.

histogram.name: DevTools.KeybindSetSettingChanged
histogram.summary: Recorded when the user changes which keyboard shortcut presets they are using in the DevTools.

histogram.name: DevTools.KeyboardShortcutFired
histogram.summary: Recorded when a DevTools keyboard shortcut has been processed and successfully executed its action.

histogram.name: DevTools.Language
histogram.summary: The actual display language used for the DevTools UI. Logged once per DevTools session when DevTools is booted up.

histogram.name: DevTools.Launch
histogram.summary: Measures the time until a given tool is interactive during a cold start of DevTools.

histogram.name: DevTools.LinearMemoryInspector.RevealedFrom
histogram.summary: Records the ways in which the Memory Inspector panel was opened.

histogram.name: DevTools.LinearMemoryInspector.Target
histogram.summary: Records the inspection target via which the Memory Inspector was opened.

histogram.name: DevTools.ManifestSectionSelected
histogram.summary: Records when certain items of the Manifest dropdown submenu in the Application Tool are selected.

histogram.name: DevTools.MutatingHttpAction
histogram.summary: Records the invocation of actions like /json/new on the HTTP server exposed with running with --remote-debugging-port.

histogram.name: DevTools.OpenedByAction
histogram.summary: Recorded when a particular action was taken to launch DevTools.

histogram.name: DevTools.PanelClosed
histogram.summary: Specified DevTools panel was closed. Fires immediately after closing a panel using the "x" button in the panel title.

histogram.name: DevTools.PanelShown
histogram.summary: Specified DevTools panel was shown.

histogram.name: DevTools.RecordingEdited
histogram.summary: Recorded when a recording is being edited by the user.

histogram.name: DevTools.RecordingExported
histogram.summary: Recorded when a recording is exported.

histogram.name: DevTools.RecordingReplayFinished
histogram.summary: Recorded when a replay is over.

histogram.name: DevTools.RecordingReplaySpeed
histogram.summary: Recorded when a recording is being replayed. Used to count number of times replay started with which speed.

histogram.name: DevTools.RecordingReplayStarted
histogram.summary: Recorded when a recording is being replayed.

histogram.name: DevTools.RecordingToggled
histogram.summary: Recorded when a recording is started or finished in the Recorder panel.

histogram.name: DevTools.SidebarPaneShown
histogram.summary: Specified DevTools sidebar pane was shown.

histogram.name: DevTools.StyleTextCopied
histogram.summary: Recorded when certain style text is copied in DevTools.

histogram.name: DevTools.SyncSetting
histogram.summary: Records whether syncing DevTools settings via Chrome Sync is enabled or why it's disabled. Logged once per DevTools session when DevTools is booted up.
